FuncDef:
The interface command displays the view of an existing interface or creates a logical interface and displays the view of the logical interface.
The undo interface command deletes a logical interface. The interface command displays the view of an existing interface or creates a logical interface and displays the view of the logical interface. The undo interface command deletes a logical interface. By default, this type of port is not created.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an interface.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the type of an interface.
Enumerated type, depending on the interface type supported by the device.

Specifies the number of an interface.
The value is a string of characters without spaces.

ExtraInfo:
A physical interface cannot be created. You can run the interface command to enter the interface view directly.
A logical interface can be created. You can run the interface command to create a logical interface and enter the view of the logical interface.
